metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16845 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Go before 1.13.15 and 14.x before 1.14.7 can have an infinite read loop inReadUvarint and ReadVarint in encoding/binary via invalid inputs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm2
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm2
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.8-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm2').
